row.process:
!executes a given sql script file :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_DB.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:IF &UC4RB_SQL_SEPARATOR# = "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_SEPARATOR# =", " :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = ""
:IF &UC4RB_DB_USERNAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -usr "&UC4RB_DB_USERNAME#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -pwd "&UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_JDBC_CONN_STRING# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -jdbc_conn "&UC4RB_DB_JDBC_CONN_STRING#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -jar "&UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_CLASS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -class "&UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_CLASS#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_SEPR# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -sep "&UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_SEPR#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_CONN_INTRVL# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, " -intrvl &UC4RB_DB_CONN_INTRVL#") :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_TNSNAMES_ORA# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, " -tns &UC4RB_DB_TNSNAMES_ORA#") :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_SQL_PASSWORD# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -sqlpwd "&UC4RB_SQL_PASSWORD#"') :ENDIF
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#oracle-db-tool.jar database SQLFeature -script "&UC4RB_SQL_FILENAME#" ? &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# "&UC4RB_SQL_SEPARATOR#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
